Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Palazzo Resort Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be minutes from Fashion Show Mall and close to Las Vegas Convention Center. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Sands Expo Convention Center and The Auto Collections.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 3066 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. High-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature bathrobes and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. Before a night out at the casino, the 11 outdoor swimming pools are a perfect way to relax and recharge. This resort also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 3 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at one of the 5 bars/lounges or 2 poolside bars.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 3 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at one of the 5 bars/lounges or 2 poolside bars.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

This resort also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

High-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature bathrobes and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at The Palazzo Resort Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be minutes from Fashion Show Mall and close to Las Vegas Convention Center. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Sands Expo Convention Center and The Auto Collections.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fashion Show Mall - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
The Auto Collections - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
High Roller - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
The Linq - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Las Vegas Convention Center - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Crystals at City Center - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Las Vegas Country Club - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Boulevard Mall - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Clark County Library - 3.3 km / 2 mi

The preferred airport for The Palazzo Resort Hotel & Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
A rollaway fee of $50.00 (plus tax) per room, per night, will be charged and collected by the hotel. This fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees that they may be responsible for but is not a guarantee of the final amount due.

A minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of $45.00 (plus tax) per room, per day, will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. The fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for but not a guarantee of the final amount due. For detailed description of what’s included in the mandatory fee please see hotel policies.

Essential Information:
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 20/Dec/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Resort fees to be paid at check-in by guest. Applicable from 21/Dec/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: Please note that a daily Resort Fee of USD 45.00 plus tax per room per night is payable directly to the hotel. Please note only Grab n GO breakfast promotions contain a maximum of 2 FREE Continental Grab and Go packaged Breakfast per day (not sit-down). Any additional breakfast will need to be paid directly to hotel. At least one occupant must be at least twenty-one (21) years of age to check in. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
